column18: 07/12/2017: Assailants threw petrol bombs at a Movement for Democratic Change - Tsvangirai (MDC-T) party vehicle in Kuwadzana, Harare, Zimbabwe. There were no reported casualties. No group claimed responsibility for the incident; however, sources attributed the attack to the Zimbabwe African Nationalist Union - Patriotic Front (ZANU-PF).
column64: The specific motive is unknown; however, sources suspected that the attack may have been related to Zimbabwe's upcoming general elections.
column97: Petrol bombs were used in the attack.
column108: A vehicle was damaged in this attack.
